name: Slender: New Pages
description:
This version is a pre-alpha version, it means that it is not yet complete, it is a version that gives a taste of the game that will be released in the coming weeks, (note that this version is almost complete and that the final game will not be so long)

A a remake of Slenderman : The Eight Pages that is made for entertainment and nostalgia only, no profit will be made from it, all rights of Slenderman go to their respective owners. #fangame #horror #arcade #survival
